entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `GetExternalLoginInfoAsync` should work even when `MapInboundClaims` is `false` #45197
  • Build time environment variables in Blazor wasm #45196
  • Website Import - blazor (wasm) web view not displayed correctly #45195
  • Not updating js module after route change #45194
  • Incorrect OpenApi documentation in Minimal API when using WithOpenApi extension method #45192
  • Error when trying to use compression (Brotli) in Blazor WASM: "Uncaught (in promise) Corrupted padding bits " #45191
  • CLI Hot reload for Blazor wasm still doesn't work in .NET 7 #45190

PullRequests

Created

  • Support `sub` as `ExternalLoginInfo.ProviderKey` #45198
    area-identity, community-contribution

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2049674 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Add OnPrepareResponseAsync #45062
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add more StringSyntaxAttrbute syntaxes #44663
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #45156
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, community-contribution
  • Add support for comment syntax to route detector #45185
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
